column13: Nuby All Natural Baby Shampoo - 10020 (200 ml) Price: Rs.250

column1: Babies come with the most tender skin there is
column3: babies are vulnerable to the slightest of disturbance. Chemicals and harsh skin care products are a no no when it comes to looking after the health and beauty of a child. The Nuby All Natural Baby Shampoo has been formulated free of chemicals so the tender hair and skin of your baby will stay protected and not lose its natural balance. This shampoo comes free of parabens and is a great relief for mothers who are troubled by the choice to make about their baby's bath implements. Now
column4: your precious little bundle of joy is going to be kept in the tender care of the right natural and organic ingredients that only leave your baby’s hair nourished. Composed of aloe vera
column5: this shampoo will gently cleanse your baby’s hair so you can always play with your little one’s soft strands.

column1: This special tear-free formula ensures that bath time with the kids does not turn into a painful affair. You can happily pamper and spend some quality time bonding with your baby as you wash off a day’s dirt. 99.999% effective against germs
column2: this shampoo will keep allergens and all bacteria away from your baby’s body so you can stay carefree about the hygiene and health of your kid. Ideal for boys and girls
column3:
this shampoo is formulated with citroganix and with every wash you will see that the shampoo ensures complete hair moisturization to make sure your precious one’s hair is softest and strongest all the time. The special anti-bacterial formula will keep you relaxed so that you do not have to keep making trips to the doctor for some treatment or medicine every other day.

Directions for Use

column1: Apply on damp hair and massage gently for a minute.
Rinse with lukewarm water.
